info.name: La Rose des Abysses - Thème Eldarya
info.description: Mon thème pour changer la bannière d'accueil ____ PLEASE DO NOT REUSE/REPOST WITHOUT CREDITING ME. JUST """CORRECTING""" SOMETHING AND POSTING THE STYLE AGAIN WITHOUT GIVING PROPER CREDIT IS NOT CORRECTING, IT'S CLAIMING AS YOUR OWN. IF YOU WANT SOMETHING TO BE MODIFIED, MESSAGE ME. THANKS! YOU CAN USE MY CODE IF YOU WANT TO MAKE A THEME WITH THE MENU ON TOP BUT GIVE PROPER CREDIT PLEASE! (technically you HAVE TO because of the license under which it is released) Un thème assez particulier, moi j'aime bien! ahah N'hésitez pas à me contacter si vous avez des suggestions :3 (mon pseudo Eldarya : Emil)
info.additionalInfo: En accord avec le nouveau layout d'Eldarya! Mon compte Eldarya (si besoin de me mp)
